segments.text: What is my schedule for today , Miss Liu ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , you are supposed to meet the president at ten fifteen this morning . Then , you have a lunch appointment with Mr . Clark . And this afternoon at three you are scheduled to speak before a group of seminar participants .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have the meeting report ready ?
segments.speaker: S1
